text: The Royal Order of the Sword (officially: Royal Order of the Sword; Swedish: Kungliga Sv√§rdsorden) is a Swedish order of chivalry and military decoration. It was created by King Frederick I of Sweden on 23 February 1748, together with the Order of the Seraphim and the Order of the Polar Star. ==References== Category:Orders, decorations, and medals
title: Order of the Sword
